title: Kurt Seligmann Exotic Garden Eyeglass Case with Cloth
description:
Eyeglass Case developed from Kurt Seligmann’s Exotic garden, 1954, from the Art Institute of Chicago’s collection.

It's good to see an everyday necessity made into a miniature masterpiece. The breathtaking botanicals in Exotic garden (c. 1954) by surrealist Kurt Seligmann (American, born Switzerland, 1900-1962) come into focus each time you reach for this hard shell eyeglass case. Matching microfiber lens cloth included. 

  • Dimensions: Glass Case: 6.25 x 2.25 x 1.25 in. Cloth: 6 x7 in.
  • Materials: Plastic, microfiber.
